6. There is to be no exclusivity factor.
In addition to these general assumptions, the station list¬
ings which have been developed assume the following routing
of network circuits:
1. The west coast circuit from Chicago is routed
via Kansas City, Denver, Salt Lake City, San Fran¬
cisco.
2. The west coast circuit is south to Los Angeles
and San Diego — north to Portland and Seattle.
3. The circuit from Atlanta is via Tallahassee to
Miami•
4. The circuit will be routed from Kansas City
to Wichita, Kansas, points in the states of Okla¬
homa and Texas.
Based on this plan, the break out of stations in categories
is:
Key Stations: 39 in 25 markets
Secondary Stations: 97
Optional Stations: 180
Tape Delay:
55
